cookie.text: This website uses cookies that are necessary for its proper functioning. Cookies are used solely for login and user identification purposes. Details can be found in our

about.text: If whenever you was thought how many matches or games you watched, or which team/league you watched the most, now it is possible due to Statsview. Statsview is the project which count games you watched by the season or year. With end of the season or year you will get your own summary.

how.text: First you sign up and then you can choose which sport you want to add. Available sport to count: Footabll, Basketball, Volleyball, Handball, Counter Strike and League of Legends. Then you can choose game from competition in our base or add your own game in different competition. Make it regularly and the effect will be awesome.

after.h3: Check your mail to resert your password
after.link: Click link to send mail again

one.heading: Data controller
one.text: The data controller is B3bq. This is a non-profit project. For data protection matters, you can contact us at:

two.heading: What data do we collect?
two.text: When using our website, we collect and process only the data necessary to use the service:
two.text2: We do not collect additional analytical and marketing data

list.three: data saved in cookies to maintain a logged-in session

three.heading: Purpose and legal basis of processing
three.text: Data is processed solely for the purpose of:
three.text2: The legal basis for processing is Article 6(1)(b) of the GDPR ‚Äì necessity for the performance of a contract or the provision of a service.

list.one: enabling logging in and using the user account
list.two: ensuring proper operation of the website

four.heading: Cookies
four.text: Our website only uses cookies that are strictly necessary for proper operation (maintaining user sessions). We do not use cookies for marketing, advertising, or analytics purposes.

list.one: Data stored in cookies are stored for the duration of the user's session or until logging out.
list.two: Data in the user database is stored for the duration of the account on the website

six.heading: Data recipients
six.text: Data is not transferred to third parties, except as required by law.

list.three: deletion of data (‚Äúright to be forgotten‚Äù)
list.five: filing a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office (UODO)
